original_text: Just then the servants of David arrived with Joab from a raid, bringing much spoil with them. But Abner was not with David at Hebron, for he had sent him away, and he had gone in peace.
korean_text: 다윗의 신복들과 요압이 적군을 치고 크게 노략한 물건을 가지고 돌아오니 아브넬은 이미 보냄을 받아 평안히 갔고 다윗과 함께 헤브론에 있지 아니한 때라

sentences.original_text: Just then the servants of David arrived with Joab from a raid
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 다윗의 신하들이 요압과 함께 약탈전에서 돌아왔는데

sentences.original_text: But Abner was not with David at Hebron
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 아브넬은 헤브론에 있는 다윗과 함께 있지 않았으니

sentences.original_text: for he had sent him away
and he had gone in peace
